name: Gobliiins pack
description:
Would you like to play something with tough puzzles and laughing-out-loud humour? What about something full of funny characters, featuring mind-bending plots and brain-teasing puzzles?

Help the King regain his sanity after he got turned into a raving lunatic, save the kidnapped prince and interview Queen Xina and King Bodd who have been fighting for years.

You will be confronted by surprise after surprise and will have to face the most unexpected enemies. Enjoy good, old-fashioned fun for everyone.Includes Gobliiins, Gobliins 2: Prince Buffoon, and Goblins Quest 3; you can choose between floppy and CD Mind-boggling puzzles in a crazy, surreal world full of even crazier characters First class witty dialog and slapstick humor
